attributes.action: North Norfolk Council to fix Sarah's beach shop!
attributes.additional_details: Thank you for supporting this petition. Sarah is personally my hero and locally a very lovely and kind wonderful lady. Her shop was destroyed in 2013 and because of new EU laws it's has been put off being fixed. Please help us get it fixed
attributes.background: Sarah is one of Cromer's communities nicest people, sadly in December of 2013, her little beach shop was destroyed by the tidal storm! The council have put fixing the shop off year by year and we only think it's fair that we get it sorted NOW! She has made do with a "pop up shed" long enough.

rejection.details:
Your petition is calling on North Norfolk Council to take action. You can find out how to start a petition to the council here:

http://www.northnorfolk.org/council/12733.asp
